A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 26, 2017 at 10:47pm PST 
Hollywood recluse Johnny Depp was a surprise guest at Madonna â€™s ultra-exclusive after-party.
Sources tell us Depp â€” who has been lying low after his bruising divorce from Amber Heard followed by his headline-making legal battle with his business managers â€” showed up at Madonnaâ€™s party, thrown with her manager Guy Oseary at his Hollywood home.

Johnny Depp spent $30K a month on wine: ex-manager 0:0 Outrageous expenses contained in a blistering countersuit filed Tuesday by... A source told us, â€œJohnny actually looked great. He looked well and relaxed. People were happy to see him. This is the hardest Oscar invitation to get, there was no media invited and the stars really kicked off their shoes and danced.â€
Madge got the crowd going with salsa dancing.
Guests included Leo DiCaprio, who was introducing model Nina Agdal to other partygoers as â€œmy girlfriend,â€ Katy Perry and boyfriend Orlando Bloom, Lana Del Rey, Jon Hamm, Ed Norton, Michelle Williams and Busy Phillips.
